Class SpaceObject

java.lang.Object
SpaceObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Asteroid, Comet, Moon, Planet, Star, Sun
public abstract class SpaceObject
extends java.lang.Object
This class can be used to represent an arbitrary object in space.
Author:
Thomas Watkins

  • Constructor Details

    • SpaceObject

      public SpaceObject​(SolarSystem solarSystem, double distance, double angle, double diameter, double velocity, java.lang.String colour)
      Constructor. Creates a new space object.
      Parameters:
      solarSystem - the solar system used to place this space object to the screen.
      distance - the distance from the sun.
      angle - the angle (in degrees) that represents how far the space object is around its orbit of the sun.
      diameter - the diameter of this space object.
      velocity - the velocity of this space object.
      colour - the colour of this space object.
